resources.string: Make this gist visible to everybody
The gist is empty. Are you sure you want to upload it?
The URL of the newly created gist will be available in the clipboard after a successful upload.

Gist is a simple way to share snippets and pastes with others. All gists are git repositories, so they are automatically versioned, forkable and usable as a git repository.
See gist.github.com for more information.
